metadata.title: CVE-2023-22998 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 6.0.3, drivers/gpu/drm/virtio/virtgpu_object.cmisinterprets the drm_gem_shmem_get_sg_table return value (expects it to beNULL in the error case, whereas it is actually an error pointer).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
